query.description:
A unique identifier for the file. [path - id]
If empty it points to the root folder.

If true, the list folder operation will be applied recursively to all subfolders and the response will contain contents of all subfolders.
Default: false
The maximum number of results to return per request.

query.description:
Folder path in the user's Dropbox to save the file. [path - id]
if empty, it will be saved in the root with the name of the file in the url.

Selects what to do if the file already exists.
Default: add

If there's a conflict, as determined by `mode`, have the Dropbox server try to autorename the file to avoid conflict error.
Default: false

query.description: (Required) Identification type for the file.

(Required) OPTIONS: A path or a shared_link depending on the option chosen in `resource`.
- A path to a file.[path - id - rev]
- A shared link pointing to a file or folder, with a relative path.

The format for the thumbnail image, jpeg (default) or png. For images that are photos, jpeg should be preferred, while png is better for screenshots and digital arts.
Default: jpeg

The size for the thumbnail image.
Default: w64h64

How to resize and crop the image to achieve the desired size.
Default: strict

item.name: Services Controller sharing Create Shared Link

query.description: (Required) The path to be shared by the shared link. [path - id - rev]

Requested access level you want the audience to gain from this link.
Note: modifying access level for an existing link is not supported. Omit this field if it is the case.

The new audience who can benefit from the access level specified by the link's access level specified in the `access` field.
Default: public

For Dropbox Professional y Dropbox Business:
Boolean flag to allow or not download capabilities for shared links.

For Dropbox Professional y Dropbox Business:
Expiration time of the shared link. Format: %Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ
By default the link won't expire

For Dropbox Professional y Dropbox Business:
Boolean flag to enable or disable password protection.

For Dropbox Professional y Dropbox Business:
If `require_password` is true, this is needed to specify the password to access the link.

variable.description:
user path is not required in swagger
(leave it blank)

request.description: Create a shared link with custom settings. If no settings are given then the default visibility is public.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

variable.description:
user path is not required in swagger
(leave it blank)

item.name: Services Controller sharing Add Folder Member

query.description:
(Required) The ID for the shared folder.
pattern='[-_0-9a-zA-Z:]+'

(Required) The intended list of members to add.
Properties:
`member` Two different ways to identify a member:

dropbox_id: Dropbox account, team member, or group ID of member. Example: dbid:AAEufNrMPSPe0dMQijRP0N_aZtBJRm26W4Q
email: Email of member. Example: test@example.com

`access_level` Options for the level of access to grant the member to the shared folder.
                         Default: viewer
  • viewer
  • editor

(Required) The intended list of members to add.
Properties:
`member` Two different ways to identify a member:

dropbox_id: Dropbox account, team member, or group ID of member. Example: dbid:AAEufNrMPSPe0dMQijRP0N_aZtBJRm26W4Q
email: Email of member. Example: test@example.com

`access_level` Options for the level of access to grant the member to the shared folder.
                         Default: viewer
  • viewer
  • editor

Whether added members should not be notified via email and device notifications of your invite.
Default: false
Optional message to display to added members in their invitation.

variable.description:
user path is not required in swagger
(leave it blank)

item.name: TIP: 'content_url' which can be used to embed content, can be obtained on this endpoint.

query.description:
The path to the file or folder to get the shared link(s). [path - id - rev]
If empty, returns a list of all shared links for the current user.

true: Only the given file or folder shared link will be returned.
false: An array containing the shared link and also the shared links to the parent folders.
Default: true

variable.description:
user path is not required in swagger
(leave it blank)

request.description:
Returns the shared link of a file or folder if `direct_only` is true (default). Otherwise, returns a list of all shared links that
allow access to the given path - direct links to the given path and links to parent folders of the given path.
Links to parent folders can be suppressed by setting `direct_only` to true.

Note:
- For a file to be previewed with the url of content_url it has to be shared and have the access level set to public.

- `direct_only` must be set to `true` to get the shared_link to a single file, if it is `false` you could also get the shared_link from
the parent link referencing that file, which you couldn't use to embed a file or download directly.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

variable.description:
user path is not required in swagger
(leave it blank)

query.description:
The maximum number of results to return per request.
Default: 1000

variable.description:
user path is not required in swagger
(leave it blank)
